# Introduction: the smiley tower

Download this starter code and complete the following exercises:
Modify the draw_smiley function to draw the second eye. 
Modify the main program to add a second smiley face just above the first one. 
Draw a whole "tower" of smiley faces, alternating colors. 
Write a function that draws a "tower" of smileys. The function should receive the starting position and the number and size of smileys from the calling program. Use this function to draw several smiley towers.
